        public void addCardToPlayer(DevCardType devCard,

        Adds a development card to the given players hand.
        Parameters:
        devCard - A DevCardType specifying the type of development card to add.
        playerIndex - The index of the player receiving the development card.

      • removeCardFromPlayer

        public void removeCardFromPlayer(DevCardType devCard,
                                 int playerIndex)
        Removes a card from the given player's development card hand.
        Parameters:
        devCard - A DevCardType specifying the type of development card to remove.
        playerIndex - The index of the player losing the development card.

      • getDevCardsForPlayer

        public DevCardList getDevCardsForPlayer(int playerIndex)
        Returns the DevCardList for the given player.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player requesting the development list.
        Returns:
        The DevCardList for the given player.
